message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000, a steal! It's a rare opportunity to get a product worth $12500 at a discounted price. I'm only offering this deal because I'm confident in the product's quality. If you don't buy it, I'll have to sell it to someone else at a higher price. This is a one-time offer, so you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I trust your confidence in the product's quality and will take advantage of this unique opportunity.

I'm glad you're satisfied with your previous purchase! However, I want to remind you that I'm not just selling any product, I'm selling a high-quality one. Since you've already experienced the value of a high-quality product, I'm willing to offer you another one at the same price. I'm confident that you'll be able to appreciate the difference it makes. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity again?
Absolutely, Alice. I appreciate the confidence you have in the quality of your products and look forward to experiencing the benefits of another high-quality item.
